text:
Gwyneth Paltrow and her 14-year-old daughter, Apple Martin, look like twins in a rare new photo the actress shared on Instagram yesterday in honor of National Daughters Day. Martin may be rocking cherry red hair in the shot, but she still looks identical to her famous mom.

"Happy #nationaldaughtersday Apple Martin, it’s like I conjured you from a dream, you make my life," Paltrow wrote.

The Goop founder shares Apple and 12-year-old son Moses with her ex-husband, Coldplay frontman Chris Martin. Paltrow rarely shares details about her kids, but she recently posted a photo of them hanging out in her backyard at the end of summer, writing, "Noooooo summer don’t go."

For Apple's 14th birthday in May, she wrote a heartfelt message along with a close up of her all-grown-up daughter. "Happy birthday, my darling girl. You make everyday feel like Christmas morning," Gwyneth said. "You are the most vibrant, hilarious, twirling all over the place, beautiful (inside and out) young woman. You are an amazing thinker and an incredible songwriter. Thanks for still hanging out with me, even though you are 14."

Apple is a musician just like her father, and even performed a duet of Ariana Grande's song "Just A Little Bit Of your Heart" with him at an event in 2016.

Although Paltrow and Martin "consciously uncoupled" in 2014, the two remain close friends and often spend time together with their kids.

Paltrow is currently engaged to TV producer and writer Brad Falchuk, who also gets along well with her ex, according to her Instagram. She even described them as a "modern family" in a post last November.
title: Gwyneth Paltrow and Daughter Apple Martin Look Like Twins in Instagram Photo
